name: recent-logic-pro-projects
title: Logic Pro Projects
description: Quickly access your most recent Logic Pro projects.
author: talbx

commands.name: recent-logic-pro-projects
commands.title: Search Recent Projects
commands.description: Quickly access your most recent Logic Pro projects.

preferences.name: projects-location
preferences.title: Your Logic Pro projects directory
preferences.description: The location where you store your logic projects, used by this extension

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
